title: COVID-19 vaccination: resources for children aged 5 to 11 years
description: Information for parents of eligible children aged 5 to 11 years on COVID-19 vaccination.
cleaned_text: COVID-19 vaccination: resources for children aged 5 to 11 years Information for parents of eligible children aged 5 to 11 years on COVID-19 vaccination. Applies to England Documents Details Resources on COVID-19 vaccination for eligible children aged 5 to 11 years. A guide for parents of children aged 5 to 11 years This leaflet should be given to parents and carers of eligible children prior to the vaccination appointment. Paper copies of this leaflet are available free to order or download in is available to order. A [British Sign Language video](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-vaccination-british-sign-language-resources) of this leaflet is available to view and download. A [Braille version](https://www.healthpublications.gov.uk/ViewArticle.html?sp=Scovid19vaccinationguideforparentsofchildrenaged5to11yearsbraille) of this leaflet is available to order. What to expect after your child's COVID-19 vaccination This leaflet is for healthcare practitioners to give to parents and carers of eligible children after their vaccination. It provides information on what to expect after vaccination. Paper copies of this leaflet are available free to order or download in is available to order. A [British Sign Language video](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-vaccination-british-sign-language-resources) of this leaflet is available to view or download. A [Braille version](https://www.healthpublications.gov.uk/ViewArticle.html?sp=Swhattoexpectafteryourcovid19vaccinationguideforparents5to11yearsofagebraille) of this leaflet is available to order. An [audio version](https://www.healthpublications.gov.uk/ViewArticle.html?sp=Swhattoexpectafteryourcovid19vaccinationguideforparents5to11yearsofageaudio) is available to download. Other resources [Resources for at-risk children aged 6 months to 11 years](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-vaccination-at-risk-children-aged-6-months-to-11-years) are available to download and order. [Resources for children and young people aged 12 to 17](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-vaccination-resources-for-children-and-young-people) are available to download and order. Health publications orderline Immunisation Publications UK Health Security Agency 61 Colindale NW9 5EQ Contact form [https://healthpublicat...](https://healthpublications.gov.uk) Telephone: 0300 123 1002 Copies of printed publications and the full range of digital resources to support the immunisation programmes can now be ordered and downloaded online. Log in to register and place your order. Last updated 21 June 2023 [+ show all updates](#full-history) - Added link to 'COVID-19 vaccination: at-risk children aged 6 months to 11 years' and removed 'A guide for parents of children aged 5 to 11 years at high risk'. - Added link to view the guide for parents of children aged 5 to 11 years British Sign Language video. - Added links to alternative formats of 'What to expect after your child's COVID-19 vaccination'; added links to translations and alternative formats of the guide for parents of children aged 5 to 11 years. - Added links to translated versions of the what to expect leaflet. - Added a guide for parents of children aged 5 to 11. - Added link to easy-read resources. - Updated the guide for parents of children aged 5 to 11 years of age at high risk. - First published.
